name: Stumptown
description:
The rush for lumber is on!

Manage and build your own lumber company as you explore the vast forests of the United States. Harvest the logs, mill the lumber, and make a profit.

Found your own company, hire workers, fell trees, construct your camp, and buy out your competition. Build your lumber empire over a 29 level campaign that spans 7 different forests - each with their own unique challenges!

If that's not enough, each day, solve a new randomly generated Daily Challenge level, or generate your own scenario with Sandbox mode after you complete the Campaign!

Challenge your friends with GameCenter achievements and leaderboards to see who dominates the lumber market.

Remember to expand, grow, and manage your operations or your whole company could come crashing down!

Never the same experience twice!
